General.Name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders. Further, the company engages in restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Pak Kret, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 337, Bond Street, Pak Kret, Thailand, 11120
